schemas.description: First data release of the DELVE survey (Drlica-Wagner et al. 2020)

columns.description: Unique identifier for each object
Right ascension derived from the median position of each detection
Declination derived from the median position of each detection
NSIDE 2048 HEALPix index, in RING scheme, for each object
PSF magnitude in g-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
PSF magnitude in r-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
PSF magnitude in i-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
PSF magnitude in z-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
PSF magnitude error in g-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
PSF magnitude error in r-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
PSF magnitude error in i-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
PSF magnitude error in z-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude in g-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude in r-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude in i-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude in z-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude error in g-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude error in r-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude error in i-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Automatic aperture magnitude error in z-band (see SExtractor manual for details)
Likelihood-based g-band star-galaxy classifier (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Likelihood-based r-band star-galaxy classifier (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Likelihood-based i-band star-galaxy classifier (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Likelihood-based z-band star-galaxy classifier (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Likelihood-based g-band star-galaxy classifier error (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Likelihood-based r-band star-galaxy classifier error (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Likelihood-based i-band star-galaxy classifier error (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Likelihood-based z-band star-galaxy classifier error (see Desai et al 2012 for details)
Neural-net g-band star-galaxy classifier (see SExtractor manual for details)
Neural-net r-band star-galaxy classifier (see SExtractor manual for details)
Neural-net i-band star-galaxy classifier (see SExtractor manual for details)
Neural-net z-band star-galaxy classifier (see SExtractor manual for details)
Weighted average PSF magnitude in g-band
Weighted average PSF magnitude in r-band
Weighted average PSF magnitude in i-band
Weighted average PSF magnitude in z-band
Sum in quadrature of the PSF magnitude errors from each g-band detection
Sum in quadrature of the PSF magnitude errors from each r-band detection
Sum in quadrature of the PSF magnitude errors from each i-band detection
Sum in quadrature of the PSF magnitude errors from each z-band detection
RMS of the PSF magnitude from each g-band detection
RMS of the PSF magnitude from each r-band detection
RMS of the PSF magnitude from each i-band detection
RMS of the PSF magnitude from each z-band detection
Weighted average automatic magnitude in g-band
Weighted average automatic magnitude in r-band
Weighted average automatic magnitude in i-band
Weighted average automatic magnitude in z-band
Sum in quadrature of the automatic magnitude errors from each g-band detection
Sum in quadrature of the automatic magnitude errors from each r-band detection
Sum in quadrature of the automatic magnitude errors from each i-band detection
Sum in quadrature of the automatic magnitude errors from each z-band detection
RMS of the automatic magnitude from each g-band detection
RMS of the automatic magnitude from each r-band detection
RMS of the automatic magnitude from each i-band detection
RMS of the automatic magnitude from each z-band detection
Weighted average g-band spread model
Weighted average r-band spread model
Weighted average i-band spread model
Weighted average z-band spread model
Weighted average g-band spread model error
Weighted average r-band spread model error
Weighted average i-band spread model error
Weighted average z-band spread model error
Weighted average g-band spread model RMS
Weighted average r-band spread model RMS
Weighted average i-band spread model RMS
Weighted average z-band spread model RMS
Exposure number for best g-band exposure
Exposure number for best r-band exposure
Exposure number for best i-band exposure
Exposure number for best z-band exposure
CCD number for best g-band exposure
CCD number for best r-band exposure
CCD number for best i-band exposure
CCD number for best z-band exposure
Effective exposure depth scale factor for best g-band exposure (see Neilsen et al 2015)
Effective exposure depth scale factor for best r-band exposure (see Neilsen et al 2015)
Effective exposure depth scale factor for best i-band exposure (see Neilsen et al 2015)
Effective exposure depth scale factor for best z-band exposure (see Neilsen et al 2015)
Shutter-open g-band exposure time
Shutter-open r-band exposure time
Shutter-open i-band exposure time
Shutter-open z-band exposure time
Semi-major axis of g-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Semi-major axis of r-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Semi-major axis of i-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Semi-major axis of z-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Semi-minor axis of g-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Semi-minor axis of r-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Semi-minor axis of i-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Semi-minor axis of z-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Position angle of g-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Position angle of r-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Position angle of i-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Position angle of z-band adaptive aperture in image coordinates
Schlegel, Finkbeiner, and Davis (1998) E(B-V) value
Interstellar extinction value derived from SFD E(B-V) and DES A(lambda) values
Interstellar extinction value derived from SFD E(B-V) and DES A(lambda) values
Interstellar extinction value derived from SFD E(B-V) and DES A(lambda) values
Interstellar extinction value derived from SFD E(B-V) and DES A(lambda) values
HTM Level-9 index
Healpix ID with nside 256, ring schema
Healpix ID with nside 4096, nested schema
Random ID in the range 0 to 100 (decimal)
Number of single epoch g-band detections that went into this object
Number of single epoch r-band detections that went into this object
Number of single epoch i-band detections that went into this object
Number of single epoch z-band detections that went into this object
SExtractor flags for the best detection in g-band
SExtractor flags for the best detection in r-band
SExtractor flags for the best detection in i-band
SExtractor flags for the best detection in z-band
OR of SExtractor flags from all g-band detections
OR of SExtractor flags from all r-band detections
OR of SExtractor flags from all i-band detections
OR of SExtractor flags from all z-band detections
Healpix ID with nside 32, ring schema
Spread_model-based morphology class (-9 unknown, 0 high-confidence star, 1 likely star, 2 likely galaxy, 3 high-confidence galaxy see DELVE DR1 paper for details)
Spread_model-based morphology class (-9 unknown, 0 high-confidence star, 1 likely star, 2 likely galaxy, 3 high-confidence galaxy see DELVE DR1 paper for details)
